title: Rajalakshmi Ruby Pendant - A Timeless Adornment
features: This exquisite pendant features a central oval-cut ruby surrounded by a halo of shimmering Polki diamonds, showcasing traditional South Indian elegance. The design incorporates three delicate danglers, each featuring a Polki diamond set in an ornate gold casing, culminating in a cluster of luminous fresh water pearls atop carved ruby beads. The intricate filigree work on the gold settings adds a touch of vintage charm.
occasions: festive occasions like Sankranthi and Diwali
and special events (party wear). Can also be worn as a statement piece for contemporary outfits.
description: This Rajalakshmi Ruby Pendant is a stunning blend of traditional South Indian design and timeless elegance. The vibrant ruby represents passion and prosperity, while the Polki diamonds add a touch of brilliance. Handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail, this pendant is a heirloom piece that will be cherished for generations. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a unique luster that enhances the beauty of the gemstones. The use of rubies and pearls is highly auspicious and brings good fortune.
